init.expr: hour12FS=16, hour12smallFS=10, hour24FS=14, cityFS=10, DSTFS=12, DSTZ=3, DSTThick=0.5, DST2Z=2, DST2Thick=0.25
cityRad2=faceR-1, dot2Rad=cityRad2-cityFS-2.5, channel2Rad=dot2Rad*2, channelWidth=.25, dotHeight=3, dotWidth=4, moverWidth=24

secLen=hour12IR, minLen=hour12IR-2, hrLen=minLen*.67, hrWid=1.5, minWid=1, secWid=.75, ly=40, hrArrow=hrLen/6, hrArrowWid=hrWid+2, minArrow=minLen/6, minArrowWid=minWid+2, secArrow=secLen/6, secArrowWid=secWid+2, handTailRadius=4
r=143, ri=r-5, th=26, bx=r*cos(th*pi/180), by=r*sin(th*pi/180), dr=8, mx=dr*cos(th*pi/180), my=dr*sin(th*pi/180)

fgColor=black, handFillColor=black, handStrokeColor=black, handoFillColor=handFillColor, arrowColor=0xff000040, secColor=0xff800000, numBgClr=0x40808080, cityColor=clear, utHand=0xa060b060, nfgclr2=0xff00a0a0, nfgclr3=0xff00a0a0, nfgclr4=0x60b0fff8
ringBack=black, leafBorder=lightGray, leafFill=white, moonLeafFill=0xff808080, nleafFill=0xff007064, nMoonLeafFill=0xff004034
sameColor=black, lessColor=0xff600000, moreColor=0xff005050, sameColorN=0xffd0d000, lessColorN=0xffff6888, moreColorN=0xff00e0e0
monX=-wheelspace*2.5, dayX=wheelspace, dayY=-55, monY=dayY, wkdX=-wheelspace*3+4, wkdY=50, bgclr=0xffe9dacf

Qhand.name: dst H
Qhand.angle: tzOffsetAngleN(firstRingSlot + 0) + sectorAngle(firstRingSlot + UTCSectorOffset(), terraIDeviceSlot()) - cityIndicatorOffset(terraIDeviceSlot(), firstRingSlot)

Qhand.name: UT hand
Qhand.angle: sectorAngle(UTRingSlot, terraIDeviceSlot())+dotOffset-cityIndicatorOffset(terraIDeviceSlot(), firstRingSlot)

Qhand.name: 24hr indic line
Qhand.angle: city24HrDialOffset(terraIDeviceSlot(), firstRingSlot)
